video_prompt: Clouds drift past and through an elaborate, spired fantasy city atop towering cliffs. Cherry blossoms sway gently. A winding, arched bridge subtly connects shifting cliff sections. Golden architectural details glint as light changes. Wisps of clouds rise and fall, creating a sense of ethereal movement around the city.
image_prompt:
**Prompt:**

**Fantasy castle/city atop towering, jagged white cliffs, reaching into a vast, cloudy blue sky. Predominantly white and gold architecture with intricate spires, domes, and grand arches. Elegant, opulent, elven/angelic aesthetic. Cherry blossom trees on green cliff tops. Winding white and gold bridges. Bright, clear lighting. Ethereal, majestic, mythical atmosphere.**
refined_video_prompt: Clouds drift and weave through architectural forms. Blossoms gently sway. Towering cliff sections subtly shift, causing connecting arches to dynamically adjust. Golden details glint and shimmer as the light alters. Wisps of mist continually rise and fall, creating an ethereal, flowing movement.
